meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Van Tyne Ari Stern Kathleen Mikulis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6005.

td.p: Mary Van Tyne, a technical editor from Larimer, Pennsylvania
Ari Stern, a mathematician from San Diego, California
Kathleen Mikulis, a stay-at-home mom from Mountain View, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,201)

tr.td: 5 OF THE 7 ANCIENT WONDERS
TV WORKPLACES

td.a: REAL SIMPLE new uses for old things

tr.td: (Alex: Real Simple, the magazine has got a new book telling you how to find new uses for old things.)
"G" MEN
PHILOSOPHERS' COUNTRY OF BIRTH
FRUITY LANGUAGE

Mary

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Kathleen
Ari
Mary
DAVID MAMET
(Alex: You're going to notice a theme here, I believe.)
TALKING REAL ESTATE
A-B-C
(Alex: Each correct response will have those letters in order.)
ALWAYS BE CLOSING
THIRD PRIZE
YOU'RE FIRED

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_1', 'clue_DJ_3_1_stuck', '(Mary: What is clausterphobia?)
...
(Alex: Remember I said "A-B-C--those letters in that order." If you had said "[*]", then the "C" would have come at the end instead of the beginning, and that\'s why we ruled against you.)

claustrophobic

Mary
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Mary] "Who is [*]?"--for Good Will Hunting. He didn\'t win for acting; he did win for Best Screenplay, as did Orson Welles.)
MaryWho is Matt Damon?
$2,000
KathleenWho is Matt Damon?
$2,600
AriWho is Matt Damon?
$3,001
Matt Damon')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Only Orson Welles & this man have been nominated for Best Actor & Original Screenplay in the same year while in their 20s')

tr.td: THE OSCARS
Only Orson Welles & this man have been nominated for Best Actor & Original Screenplay in the same year while in their 20s
Kathleen
Ari
Mary
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $17,201
3rd place: $1,000
Kathleen
Ari
Mary

3 W
(including 2 DDs)

3 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
